name: Mermaid,fairy, princess, prince, Dolly, Monkey, Lion, cat, or Owl Softies. sold separately.
description:
Choose one: MERMAID, FAIRY, PRINCESS, PRINCE, DOLLY, MONKEY, LION, CAT or OWL Plush toys.

Sweet one of a kind SOFTIE plush toy, made at the time of order by me to fit your little one's personality.

Would you like her to have red hair? Purple? Blue? Green? Blond? Brown?

Would you like her to have cream skin? Blue? Green? Black? brown?

Is her tail/wings a fun scale green Batik? or would you like a hand-dyed cotton? or even a simple floral?

What is your perfect COMPANION?

Mermaid, fairy, monkey, lion, and Cat "stand" at 15 inches, the Prince, princess, and Owl "stand" at 12 inches, and the dolly stands at just under 10".  All are full of cuddly goodness.  All Their parts are hand-sewn on with a fully embroidered face, with the acception of the fairy wings, they are removable via buttons. Completely machine washable. Simply an inspiration.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

join us on facebook to see more pictures! www.facebook.com/UrsulasHandmadeTreasures

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
some dolls are made using dollsanddaydreams.com pattern

name: Ruffle pants and tank top set.
description:
SET: RUFFLE PANTS and TANK TOP

Ruffle leggings/pants are all the rage, why? Because they are just that awesome and versatile.  Made from stretch ruffle knit, the ruffles are a part of the fabric and can not be pulled off. Fully machine washable and go well under a dress or as a stand alone.  

Each set is made by me at the time of order, I can do standard sizing or I am happy to do custom sized sets. 

This is for a complete set, ruffle leggings/pants plus a matching tank top.  Can be worn together or separately, what ever your little one is fancying that day!  

I have a variety of colors and ruffle types, please contact me for details. There are over 25 selections on hand, if you are looking for it I probably have it.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

join us on facebook! www.facebook.com/UrsulasHandmadeTreasures

name: Ruffled romper and mini-top hat, simple silhouette.  Photography Prop.
description:
SET:  RUFFLE ROMPER and MINI-TOP HAT

Perfect set for those memorable photo shoots, and when the photo shoot is over the romper is perfect on the playground, a night on the town with the family, or just hanging around the house.

Simple silhouette ruffled romper: the ruffle knit fabric has the ruffles directly attached to the fabric and can not be pulled off.  The top of the romper sits right above the nipples, and extends down to mid-thigh. 

Fully machine washable. 

Then to top it off is a custom handmade mini-top hat, also made by me at the time of order. Full hand sculpted buckram base, covered with silk or linen and finished with rhinestones, silk flowers, and luxurious feathers.  Mini-top hat can be worn by infant, toddler, child or adult. 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

join us on facebook! www.facebook.com/UrsulasHandmadeTreasures

name: Wings, Play cape made from upcycled material
description:
Children's play wings, made from upcycled studio materials.  Let imagination take flight, making play time full of fantasy.

Custom made by me, at the time of order, from upcycled studio materials.  All feathers are rolled-hem surged to prevent fraying and to give a textured look, and made from natural materials.  Fully customizable to wing size, colors, gradient, and fit.  Made to grow with your child.  Toddler sizes will expand up to a 45" wing span, Child sizes expand up to a 56" wing span, and adult up to a 64" wing span. 

There are two sets of elastic straps, one at the shoulder and one at the wrist.  In no way does this product attach to, or wrap around your childs neck!

Please contact me if you have any questions prior to ordering, and allow up to 21 days for your set to be made then shipped out.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

join us on facebook! www.facebook.com/UrsulasHandmadeTreasures

name: Diaper cover ruffled,  Sassy Ruffle Butt Diaper Cover. Photography prop.
description:
SET:  RUFFLE BUT DIAPER COVER and HEADBAND

3-tiered ruffled diaper cover, with coordinating lace headband.  Creating such an elegant and simply sweet portrait moment, completely machine washable.  

Simply slides up over existing diaper, ruffles are on the back only and are made flounce style (not pleated).  The body you see in the ruffles is all fabric!  

Standard set is made from textured white cotton (has an imprinted white design on the white background)  If you would like a different color please contact me prior to purchasing.  

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

join us on facebook! www.facebook.com/UrsulasHandmadeTreasures
